20101211020312.667|20101211020314.333|CCO|>> Brown: IT WAS A DAY OF HIGH
20101211020314.333|20101211020316.000|CCO|CEREMONY IN OSLO, NORWAY-- THE
20101211020316.000|20101211020317.667|CCO|DAY WHEN THE NOBEL PEACE PRIZE
20101211020317.667|20101211020319.333|CCO|WAS SUPPOSED TO BE HANDED OUT.
20101211020319.333|20101211020321.000|CCO|INSTEAD, THE WINNER OF THE PRIZE
20101211020321.000|20101211020323.500|CCO|REMAINED IN A CHINESE PRISON.
20101211020323.500|20101211020326.000|CCO|
20101211020326.000|20101211020328.500|CCO|TRUMPETS ECHOED THROUGH THE CITY
20101211020328.500|20101211020331.000|CCO|HALL OF OSLO AS THE KING AND
20101211020331.000|20101211020332.667|CCO|QUEEN OF NORWAY AND DIGNITARIES
20101211020332.667|20101211020334.333|CCO|FROM DOZENS OF COUNTRIES TOOK
20101211020334.333|20101211020336.000|CCO|THEIR PLACES.
20101211020336.000|20101211020337.667|CCO|THEY CAME TO HONOR CHINESE
20101211020337.667|20101211020339.333|CCO|DISSIDENT AND LITERARY CRITIC
20101211020339.333|20101211020341.000|CCO|LIU XIABAO, WHO WAS SENTENCED
20101211020341.000|20101211020342.667|CCO|LAST CHRISTMAS DAY TO 11 YEARS
20101211020342.667|20101211020344.333|CCO|BEHIND BARS.
20101211020344.333|20101211020346.000|CCO|NORWEGIAN NOBEL COMMITTEE CHAIR
20101211020346.000|20101211020347.667|CCO|THORBJORN JAGLAND MADE THE
20101211020347.667|20101211020349.333|CCO|ANNOUNCEMENT.
20101211020349.333|20101211020351.000|CCO|>> WE REGRET THAT THE LAUREATE
20101211020351.000|20101211020353.000|CCO|IS NOT PRESENT.
20101211020353.000|20101211020355.000|CCO|HE IS IN ISOLATION IN A PRISON
20101211020355.000|20101211020357.000|CCO|IN NORTHEAST CHINA.
20101211020357.000|20101211020359.000|CCO|NOR CAN THE LAUREATE'S WIFE, LIU
20101211020359.000|20101211020401.000|CCO|XIA, OR HIS CLOSEST RELATIVES BE
20101211020401.000|20101211020403.000|CCO|WITH US.
20101211020403.000|20101211020405.000|CCO|NO MEDAL OR DIPLOMA WILL
20101211020405.000|20101211020407.000|CCO|THEREFORE BE PRESENTED HERE
20101211020407.000|20101211020409.000|CCO|TODAY.
20101211020409.000|20101211020411.000|CCO|>> Brown: INSTEAD, AN EMPTY
20101211020411.000|20101211020412.667|CCO|CHAIR WAS LEFT WHERE LIU WOULD
20101211020412.667|20101211020414.333|CCO|HAVE SAT, HIS AWARD PLACED
20101211020414.333|20101211020416.000|CCO|THERE.
20101211020416.000|20101211020417.667|CCO|IT WAS THE FIRST TIME A PEACE
20101211020417.667|20101211020419.333|CCO|PRIZE WINNER HAD BEEN PREVENTED
20101211020419.333|20101211020421.000|CCO|FROM ATTENDING THE CEREMONY
20101211020421.000|20101211020422.429|CCO|SINCE 1936, WHEN ADOLF HITLER
20101211020422.429|20101211020423.857|CCO|BARRED A GERMAN PACIFIST FROM
20101211020423.857|20101211020425.286|CCO|ACCEPTING THE AWARD.
20101211020425.286|20101211020426.714|CCO|CHINA HAD ALSO BARRED LIU'S
20101211020426.714|20101211020428.143|CCO|CLOSE RELATIVES FROM ATTENDING,
20101211020428.143|20101211020429.571|CCO|SO NORWEGIAN ACTRESS LIV ULLMAN
20101211020429.571|20101211020431.000|CCO|READ FROM HIS COURT APPEAL LAST
20101211020431.000|20101211020433.500|CCO|DECEMBER.
20101211020433.500|20101211020436.000|CCO|>> I HOPE THAT I WILL BE THE
20101211020436.000|20101211020438.500|CCO|LAST VICTIM OF CHINA'S ENDLESS
20101211020438.500|20101211020441.000|CCO|LITERARY INQUISITIONS, AND THAT
20101211020441.000|20101211020451.000|CCO|FROM NOW ON, NO ONE WILL BE
20101211020451.000|20101211020453.500|CCO|INCRIMINATED BECAUSE OF SPEECH.
20101211020453.500|20101211020456.000|CCO|FREEDOM OF EXPRESSION IS THE
20101211020456.000|20101211020458.500|CCO|FOUNDATION OF HUMAN RIGHTS, THE
20101211020458.500|20101211020501.000|CCO|SOURCE OF HUMANITY AND THE
20101211020501.000|20101211020503.000|CCO|MOTHER OF TRUTH."
20101211020503.000|20101211020505.000|CCO|>> Brown: LIU'S CRIME, UNDER
20101211020505.000|20101211020507.000|CCO|CHINESE LAW, WAS AUTHORING AN
20101211020507.000|20101211020509.000|CCO|OPEN LETTER CALLED "CHARTER 08".
20101211020509.000|20101211020511.000|CCO|IT CALLED FOR OPEN ELECTIONS,
20101211020511.000|20101211020513.000|CCO|FREE SPEECH AND THE RULE OF LAW.
20101211020513.000|20101211020515.000|CCO|HE HAD ALSO BEEN A LEADER OF THE
20101211020515.000|20101211020517.000|CCO|TIANANMEN SQUARE DEMOCRACY
20101211020517.000|20101211020519.000|CCO|MOVEMENT IN 1989, AND SERVED
20101211020519.000|20101211020521.000|CCO|SEVERAL OTHER PRISON TERMS FOR
20101211020521.000|20101211020522.667|CCO|DISSIDENT ACTIVITIES.
20101211020522.667|20101211020524.333|CCO|THE CHINESE GOVERNMENT ANGRILY
20101211020524.333|20101211020526.000|CCO|PROTESTED AWARDING THE PEACE
20101211020526.000|20101211020527.667|CCO|PRIZE TO LIU.
20101211020527.667|20101211020529.333|CCO|TODAY, A STATE-RUN NEWS CHANNEL
20101211020529.333|20101211020531.000|CCO|DENOUNCED THE AWARD AGAIN, PART
20101211020531.000|20101211020532.429|CCO|OF A CONCERTED CAMPAIGN THAT'S
20101211020532.429|20101211020533.857|CCO|BEEN GOING ON FOR WEEKS.
20101211020533.857|20101211020535.286|CCO|>> (translated): WE ARE FIRMLY
20101211020535.286|20101211020536.714|CCO|AGAINST THE ATTEMPT BY ANY
20101211020536.714|20101211020538.143|CCO|COUNTRY OR INDIVIDUAL TO USE THE
20101211020538.143|20101211020539.571|CCO|NOBEL PEACE PRIZE TO INTERFERE
20101211020539.571|20101211020541.000|CCO|IN CHINA'S INTERNAL AFFAIRS AND
20101211020541.000|20101211020542.667|CCO|INFRINGE UPON CHINA'S JUDICIAL
20101211020542.667|20101211020544.333|CCO|SOVEREIGNTY.
20101211020544.333|20101211020546.000|CCO|>> Brown: SECURITY WAS TIGHT
20101211020546.000|20101211020547.667|CCO|OUTSIDE LIU'S APARTMENT BUILDING
20101211020547.667|20101211020549.333|CCO|IN BEIJING, WHERE HIS WIFE HAS
20101211020549.333|20101211020551.000|CCO|BEEN INCOMMUNICADO, AS POLICE
20101211020551.000|20101211020553.000|CCO|SHOOED AWAY INQUIRING
20101211020553.000|20101211020555.000|CCO|JOURNALISTS.
20101211020555.000|20101211020557.000|CCO|THE REGIME ALSO TOOK EXTENSIVE
20101211020557.000|20101211020559.000|CCO|MEASURES TO CENSOR FOREIGN NEWS
20101211020559.000|20101211020601.000|CCO|COVERAGE SEEN INSIDE CHINA.
20101211020601.000|20101211020603.000|CCO|BLACKOUTS AFFECTED CNN AND THE
20101211020603.000|20101211020605.000|CCO|BBC, AND THE SO-CALLED "GREAT
20101211020605.000|20101211020607.000|CCO|FIREWALL" BLOCKED MANY NEWS WEB
20101211020607.000|20101211020609.000|CCO|SITES.
20101211020609.000|20101211020611.000|CCO|NEVERTHELESS, TWITTER IN CHINA
20101211020611.000|20101211020612.429|CCO|LIT UP WITH TALK OF HOW TO WATCH
20101211020612.429|20101211020613.857|CCO|THE CEREMONY, DESPITE THE
20101211020613.857|20101211020615.286|CCO|BLACKOUT.
20101211020615.286|20101211020616.714|CCO|ON THE DIPLOMATIC FRONT,
20101211020616.714|20101211020618.143|CCO|BEIJING THREATENED REPRISALS
20101211020618.143|20101211020619.571|CCO|AGAINST COUNTRIES WHO SENT
20101211020619.571|20101211020621.000|CCO|ENVOYS TO THE CEREMONY IN OSLO.
20101211020621.000|20101211020622.429|CCO|AND 16 NATIONS SKIPPED THE
20101211020622.429|20101211020623.857|CCO|PROCEEDINGS, INCLUDING RUSSIA,
20101211020623.857|20101211020625.286|CCO|IRAQ, IRAN, AFGHANISTAN,
20101211020625.286|20101211020626.714|CCO|PAKISTAN, EGYPT, AND SAUDI
20101211020626.714|20101211020628.143|CCO|ARABIA.
20101211020628.143|20101211020629.571|CCO|BUT THE NOBEL COMMITTEE'S
20101211020629.571|20101211020631.000|CCO|JAGLAND INSISTED THE PRIZE WAS
20101211020631.000|20101211020634.333|CCO|NOT MEANT AS AN INSULT.
20101211020634.333|20101211020637.667|CCO|>> CHINA'S NEW STATUS ENTAILS
20101211020637.667|20101211020641.000|CCO|INCREASED RESPONSIBILITY.
20101211020641.000|20101211020643.500|CCO|CHINA MUST BE PREPARED FOR
20101211020643.500|20101211020646.000|CCO|CRITICISM AND REGARD IT AS
20101211020646.000|20101211020648.500|CCO|POSITIVE.
20101211020648.500|20101211020651.000|CCO|IT HAS BEEN IMPORTANT TO REMIND
20101211020651.000|20101211020652.667|CCO|THE WORLD THAT THE RIGHTS SO
20101211020652.667|20101211020654.333|CCO|WIDELY ENJOYED TODAY WERE FOUGHT
20101211020654.333|20101211020656.000|CCO|AND WON BY PERSONS WHO TOOK
20101211020656.000|20101211020657.667|CCO|GREAT RISKS.
20101211020657.667|20101211020659.333|CCO|THEY DID SO FOR OTHERS, FOR ALL
20101211020659.333|20101211020701.000|CCO|OF US.
20101211020701.000|20101211020703.500|CCO|THIS IS WHY LIU XIAOBO DESERVES
20101211020703.500|20101211020706.000|CCO|OUR SUPPORT TODAY.
20101211020706.000|20101211020708.500|CCO|>> Brown: IN WASHINGTON,
20101211020708.500|20101211020711.000|CCO|SECRETARY OF STATE HILLARY
20101211020711.000|20101211020712.429|CCO|CLINTON SAID LIU HAS BEEN
20101211020712.429|20101211020713.857|CCO|PERSECUTED FOR PROMOTING HUMAN
20101211020713.857|20101211020715.286|CCO|RIGHTS.
20101211020715.286|20101211020716.714|CCO|>> WE CONTINUE TO CALL FOR HIS
20101211020716.714|20101211020718.143|CCO|RELEASE, AND TODAY, WE CALL FOR
20101211020718.143|20101211020719.571|CCO|THE RELEASE OF A NOBEL PEACE
20101211020719.571|20101211020721.000|CCO|PRIZE WINNER.
20101211020721.000|20101211020723.000|CCO|>> Brown: AND LAST YEAR'S NOBEL
20101211020723.000|20101211020725.000|CCO|PEACE LAUREATE, PRESIDENT OBAMA,
20101211020725.000|20101211020727.000|CCO|ISSUED A STATEMENT LAUDING LIU,
20101211020727.000|20101211020729.000|CCO|SAYING, IN PART, "MR. LIU XIAOBO
20101211020729.000|20101211020731.000|CCO|IS FAR MORE DESERVING OF THIS
20101211020731.000|20101211020741.000|CCO|AWARD THAN I WAS."
20101211020741.000|20101211020743.000|CCO|IN A 2008 INTERVIEW, LIU SPOKE
20101211020743.000|20101211020745.000|CCO|OF HIS WORK.
20101211020745.000|20101211020747.000|CCO|>> (translated): IT'S NOT TRUE
20101211020747.000|20101211020749.000|CCO|THAT THE GOVERNMENT CAN SIMPLY
20101211020749.000|20101211020751.000|CCO|IGNORE US, THAT THEY DON'T CARE
20101211020751.000|20101211020752.250|CCO|WHAT WE DO.
20101211020752.250|20101211020753.500|CCO|IF THEY DIDN'T CARE, THEY WOULD
20101211020753.500|20101211020754.750|CCO|NOT GO TO SUCH LENGTHS TO
20101211020754.750|20101211020756.000|CCO|MONITOR AND CONTROL US.
20101211020756.000|20101211020757.250|CCO|I ALSO SENSE THAT THE COMMUNITY
20101211020757.250|20101211020758.500|CCO|WHICH EMPATHIZES WITH US,
20101211020758.500|20101211020759.750|CCO|SUPPORTS US AND IS PREPARED TO
20101211020759.750|20101211020801.000|CCO|SPEAK OUT FOR US IS GROWING.
20101211020801.000|20101211020801.909|CCO|>> Brown: EVEN IN HIS ABSENCE,
20101211020801.909|20101211020802.818|CCO|THE POWER OF LIU'S OWN WORDS
20101211020802.818|20101211020803.727|CCO|ECHOED IN OSLO TODAY.
20101211020803.727|20101211020804.636|CCO|NOBEL OFFICIALS SAID THAT, FROM
20101211020804.636|20101211020805.545|CCO|HIS PRISON CELL, HE HAD
20101211020805.545|20101211020806.455|CCO|DEDICATED THE PRIZE TO THE "LOST
20101211020806.455|20101211020807.364|CCO|SOULS" OF TIANANMEN SQUARE.
20101211020807.364|20101211020808.273|CCO|>> Lehrer: COMING UP, WHAT THE
20101211020808.273|20101211020809.182|CCO|NOBEL AWARD MEANS FOR THE STATE
20101211020809.182|20101211020810.091|CCO|OF U.S. CHINA RELATIONS;
20101211020810.091|20101211020811.000|CCO|PLUS, THE STUDENT RIOTS IN
20101211020811.000|20101211020812.667|CCO|BRITAIN;
20101211020812.667|20101211020814.333|CCO|THE TAX CUT COMPROMISE HERE IN
20101211020814.333|20101211020816.000|CCO|THE U.S.;
20101211020816.000|20101211020817.667|CCO|THE ANALYSIS OF SHIELDS AND
20101211020817.667|20101211020819.333|CCO|BROOKS;
20101211020819.333|20101211020821.000|CCO|AND RAP MUSIC AS AN ART FORM.
20101211020821.000|20101211020822.429|CCO|BUT FIRST, THE OTHER NEWS OF THE
20101211020822.429|20101211020823.857|CCO|DAY.

20101211022254.750|20101211022256.000|CCO|MORE TO COME.
20101211022256.000|20101211022257.250|CCO|>> Brown: MARGARET WARNER TAKES
20101211022257.250|20101211022258.500|CCO|THE STORY FROM THERE.
20101211022258.500|20101211022259.750|CCO|>> Warner: THE PLAN TO TRIPLE
20101211022259.750|20101211022301.000|CCO|COLLEGE TUITION FEES IS PART OF
20101211022301.000|20101211022302.667|CCO|A BROAD BUDGET RE-BALANCING
20101211022302.667|20101211022304.333|CCO|PROGRAM NOW BEING PUT IN PLACE
20101211022304.333|20101211022306.000|CCO|BY BRITAIN'S CONSERVATIVE
20101211022306.000|20101211022307.667|CCO|PRIME MINISTER DAVID CAMERON AND
20101211022307.667|20101211022309.333|CCO|HIS COALITION PARTNER, THE
20101211022309.333|20101211022311.000|CCO|LIBERAL DEMOCRATS.

20101211022312.667|20101211022314.333|CCO|COMMONS YESTERDAY, BUT WITH

20101211022321.000|20101211022322.667|CCO|OBSERVER," A LONDON NEWSPAPER.
20101211022322.667|20101211022324.333|CCO|NED TEMKO, WELCOME.
20101211022324.333|20101211022326.000|CCO|FIRST OF ALL, BRIEFLY, WHAT
20101211022326.000|20101211022327.667|CCO|IS THE MAIN FOCUS OF THESE
20101211022327.667|20101211022329.333|CCO|INVESTIGATIONS THAT WERE
20101211022329.333|20101211022331.000|CCO|LAUNCHED TODAY?
20101211022331.000|20101211022332.429|CCO|NESS WELL, THERE ARE TWO
20101211022332.429|20101211022333.857|CCO|AREAS THEY ARE LOOKING INTO,
20101211022333.857|20101211022335.286|CCO|THE NARROW ONE IS HOW ON
20101211022335.286|20101211022336.714|CCO|EARTH PRINCE CHARLES THE
20101211022336.714|20101211022338.143|CCO|HEIR TO THE BRITISH THRONE
20101211022338.143|20101211022339.571|CCO|AND HIS WIFE CAMILLA THE
20101211022339.571|20101211022341.000|CCO|DUCHESS OF CORNWALL FOUND
20101211022341.000|20101211022343.000|CCO|THEMSELVES IN THEIR OFFICIAL
20101211022343.000|20101211022345.000|CCO|ROLLS-ROYCE BEING PELTED
20101211022345.000|20101211022347.000|CCO|WITH PAINT, PEOPLE BAYING
20101211022347.000|20101211022349.000|CCO|FOR THEIR HEADS.
20101211022349.000|20101211022351.000|CCO|AND ROYAL PROTECTION
20101211022351.000|20101211022353.000|CCO|OFFICERS, SOME OF WHOM ARE
20101211022353.000|20101211022355.000|CCO|ARMED, LEFT TO TRY AND
20101211022355.000|20101211022357.000|CCO|SCURRY THEIR WAY OUT OF
20101211022357.000|20101211022359.000|CCO|DANGER AND SOMEHOW KEEP AN
20101211022359.000|20101211022401.000|CCO|OBVIOUSLY SERIOUS CLASH FROM
20101211022401.000|20101211022402.667|CCO|BECOMING MORE SERIOUS YET.
20101211022402.667|20101211022404.333|CCO|AND POSSIBLY CAUSING
20101211022404.333|20101211022406.000|CCO|BLOODSHED.
20101211022406.000|20101211022407.667|CCO|SO THAT'S ONE NARROW FOCUS.
20101211022407.667|20101211022409.333|CCO|MORE BROADLY, HOW THESE
20101211022409.333|20101211022411.000|CCO|DEMONSTRATIONS TURNED

20101211023011.000|20101211023012.250|CCO|DEMOCRATS.
20101211023012.250|20101211023013.500|CCO|THE PRESIDENT AGAIN PREDICTED
20101211023013.500|20101211023014.750|CCO|PASSAGE.
20101211023014.750|20101211023016.000|CCO|AND IN AN INTERVIEW WITH
20101211023016.000|20101211023017.250|CCO|NATIONAL PUBLIC RADIO, HE
20101211023017.250|20101211023018.500|CCO|SUGGESTED HE COULD ACCEPT SOME
20101211023018.500|20101211023019.750|CCO|MODIFICATIONS.
20101211023019.750|20101211023021.000|CCO|>> MY SENSE IS... IS THAT THERE
20101211023021.000|20101211023022.111|CCO|ARE GOING TO BE DISCUSSIONS
20101211023022.111|20101211023023.222|CCO|BETWEEN BOTH HOUSE AND SENATE
20101211023023.222|20101211023024.333|CCO|LEADERSHIP ABOUT ALL THE FINAL

20101211024355.286|20101211024356.714|CCO|RISK OF OUR MILITARY.
20101211024356.714|20101211024358.143|CCO|>> Lehrer: HOW DO YOU READ
20101211024358.143|20101211024359.571|CCO|THE REPUBLICAN POLITICS ON
20101211024359.571|20101211024401.000|CCO|THIS?
20101211024401.000|20101211024402.250|CCO|THEY CAME WITHIN THREE
20101211024402.250|20101211024403.500|CCO|VOTES.
20101211024403.500|20101211024404.750|CCO|BUT THEY DIDN'T GET THE 60.
20101211024404.750|20101211024406.000|CCO|BUT THE MAJORITY WAS THERE.
20101211024406.000|20101211024407.250|CCO|>> I ASSUME FOR MOST
20101211024407.250|20101211024408.500|CCO|REPUBLICANS YOU DON'T WANT
20101211024408.500|20101211024409.750|CCO|TO SUPPORT THIS.
20101211024409.750|20101211024411.000|CCO|YOUR PEOPLE, SENIORS,
20101211024411.000|20101211024412.250|CCO|ESPECIALLY, AGAIN THIS IS A
20101211024412.250|20101211024413.500|CCO|GENERATIONAL THING.
20101211024413.500|20101211024414.750|CCO|SENIORS, IN THE SHORT TERM
20101211024414.750|20101211024416.000|CCO|ARE AGAINST IT.
20101211024416.000|20101211024417.250|CCO|AND SO IT'S PROBABLY A SAFE
20101211024417.250|20101211024418.500|CCO|BET FOR A REPUBLICAN TO VOTE
20101211024418.500|20101211024419.750|CCO|AGAINST THIS THING FOR NOW.
20101211024419.750|20101211024421.000|CCO|I WOULDN'T SAY THE SAME
20101211024421.000|20101211024422.429|CCO|THING IN TEN YEARS FROM NOW
20101211024422.429|20101211024423.857|CCO|BUT FOR NOW.
20101211024423.857|20101211024425.286|CCO|>> Lehrer: BUT THE CHANGE IN

20101211024429.571|20101211024431.000|CCO|>> NO, EXACTLY RIGHT,
20101211024431.000|20101211024432.111|CCO|DAVID'S RIGHT.
20101211024432.111|20101211024433.222|CCO|>> Lehrer: AND IT WILL BE
20101211024433.222|20101211024434.333|CCO|AWHILE.
20101211024434.333|20101211024435.444|CCO|AND DO YOU AGREE, THE COURTS
20101211024435.444|20101211024436.556|CCO|ARE GOING TO HAVE TO FINALLY
20101211024436.556|20101211024437.667|CCO|RESOLVE THIS.
20101211024437.667|20101211024438.778|CCO|>> THE COURTS, IF NOT THAT,
20101211024438.778|20101211024439.889|CCO|THE GENERATIONS.
20101211024439.889|20101211024441.000|CCO|>> Lehrer: YEAH.
20101211024441.000|20101211024442.667|CCO|WHAT ABOUT START, IS THE

20101211024444.333|20101211024446.000|CCO|>> THIS WAS JOHN KYL'S

20101211024508.500|20101211024509.750|CCO|CAME OUT OF NOWHERE.

20101211024526.000|20101211024527.250|CCO|>> IT IS POLITICS THAT IS
20101211024527.250|20101211024528.500|CCO|HOW IT IS SUPPOSED TO WORK.
20101211024528.500|20101211024529.750|CCO|>> Lehrer: IT IS SUPPOSED TO
20101211024529.750|20101211024531.000|CCO|WORK THIS WAY AND IT HAS.
20101211024531.000|20101211024536.000|CCO|THANK YOU BOTH VERY MUCH.
20101211024536.000|20101211024541.000|CCO|>> THANK YOU
20101211024541.000|20101211024543.500|CCO|>> Brown: FINALLY TONIGHT, FROM
20101211024543.500|20101211024546.000|CCO|OUR POLITICAL WRAP TO RAP, THE
20101211024546.000|20101211024548.500|CCO|MUSIC, AND MAYBE, RAP, THE LYRIC
20101211024548.500|20101211024551.000|CCO|POETRY.
20101211024551.000|20101211024553.500|CCO|
20101211024553.500|20101211024556.000|CCO|RAP MUSIC, IN THE DECADES SINCE
20101211024556.000|20101211024558.500|CCO|IT AROSE OUT OF THE BRONX IN THE
20101211024558.500|20101211024601.000|CCO|1970s, IT'S BEEN EMBRACED BY
20101211024601.000|20101211024602.667|CCO|MILLIONS AS A VIBRANT NEW
20101211024602.667|20101211024604.333|CCO|CULTURAL FORM, AND VILIFIED FOR
20101211024604.333|20101211024606.000|CCO|ITS PROFANITY AND CELEBRATION OF
20101211024606.000|20101211024607.667|CCO|VIOLENCE.
20101211024607.667|20101211024609.333|CCO|IT HAS SEEN ITS STARS KILLED AND
20101211024609.333|20101211024611.000|CCO|INCARCERATED, OR BECOME
20101211024611.000|20101211024614.333|CCO|ENTERTAINMENT MOGULS AND
20101211024614.333|20101211024617.667|CCO|INTERNATIONAL CELEBRITIES.
20101211024617.667|20101211024621.000|CCO|
20101211024621.000|20101211024622.667|CCO|BUT IT HAS NOT, UNTIL NOW, BEEN
20101211024622.667|20101211024624.333|CCO|PRESENTED QUITE LIKE THIS-- AS
20101211024624.333|20101211024626.000|CCO|LYRIC POETRY, PUBLISHED BY THE
20101211024626.000|20101211024627.667|CCO|PRESTIGIOUS YALE UNIVERSITY
20101211024627.667|20101211024629.333|CCO|PRESS IN THE NEW "ANTHOLOGY OF
20101211024629.333|20101211024631.000|CCO|RAP."
20101211024631.000|20101211024633.000|CCO|EDITORS ADAM BRADLEY AND ANDREW
20101211024633.000|20101211024635.000|CCO|DUBOIS, WHO RECENTLY CAME TO
20101211024635.000|20101211024637.000|CCO|WASHINGTON'S LINCOLN THEATER
20101211024637.000|20101211024639.000|CCO|FOR A PUBLIC FORUM ON THE
20101211024639.000|20101211024641.000|CCO|POETICS OF RAP, MET AS GRADUATE
20101211024641.000|20101211024643.500|CCO|STUDENTS IN HARVARD'S ENGLISH
20101211024643.500|20101211024646.000|CCO|DEPARTMENT, WHERE SHAKESPEARE
20101211024646.000|20101211024648.500|CCO|AND SHELLEY TEND TO HAVE PRIDE
20101211024648.500|20101211024651.000|CCO|OF PLACE OVER ICE CUBE AND SNOOP
20101211024651.000|20101211024653.000|CCO|DOGG.
20101211024653.000|20101211024655.000|CCO|>>  DROP IT LIKE IT'S HOT...
20101211024655.000|20101211024657.000|CCO|>> Brown: BUT, SAYS BRADLEY:
20101211024657.000|20101211024659.000|CCO|>> AT NIGHT, AT DAY, BETWEEN
20101211024659.000|20101211024701.000|CCO|CLASSES, WHENEVER POSSIBLE, WE
20101211024701.000|20101211024703.000|CCO|WERE LISTENING TO ALL THE GREAT
20101211024703.000|20101211024705.000|CCO|RAP ARTISTS OF THAT PERIOD, MID-
20101211024705.000|20101211024707.000|CCO|TO LATE-'90s.
20101211024707.000|20101211024709.000|CCO|AND I SOON FOUND OUT THAT I HAD
20101211024709.000|20101211024711.000|CCO|A PARTNER IN RHYME WHO WAS
20101211024711.000|20101211024712.429|CCO|ALSO LISTENING TO THE SAME
20101211024712.429|20101211024713.857|CCO|THINGS, EVEN AS WE WERE TAKING
20101211024713.857|20101211024715.286|CCO|COURSES IN POETICS, YOU KNOW,
20101211024715.286|20101211024716.714|CCO|THE WHOLE LITERARY CANON.
20101211024716.714|20101211024718.143|CCO|AND IT WAS THE KIND OF SYNERGY
20101211024718.143|20101211024719.571|CCO|THAT WE BOTH SAW GOING ON
20101211024719.571|20101211024721.000|CCO|BETWEEN THOSE THINGS.
20101211024721.000|20101211024723.500|CCO|>> AS WE WERE BECOMING TEACHERS,
20101211024723.500|20101211024726.000|CCO|GRADUATES, TEACHING ASSISTANTS,
20101211024726.000|20101211024728.500|CCO|WE REALIZED THAT ONE OF THE WAYS
20101211024728.500|20101211024731.000|CCO|THAT AN ART FORM GETS
20101211024731.000|20101211024732.667|CCO|DISSEMINATED AND UNDERSTOOD AND
20101211024732.667|20101211024734.333|CCO|APPRECIATED IS BY HAVING
20101211024734.333|20101211024736.000|CCO|MATERIALS THAT MAKE IT AVAILABLE
20101211024736.000|20101211024737.667|CCO|TO PEOPLE.
20101211024737.667|20101211024739.333|CCO|>> Brown: NOW, RAP CAN BE ROUGH,
20101211024739.333|20101211024741.000|CCO|AND IT IS CERTAINLY OFTEN
20101211024741.000|20101211024743.500|CCO|PROFANE...
20101211024743.500|20101211024746.000|CCO|
20101211024746.000|20101211024748.500|CCO|>> Brown: BUT BRADLEY AND DUBOIS
20101211024748.500|20101211024751.000|CCO|SAY IT OFFERS WHAT POETRY ALWAYS
20101211024751.000|20101211024752.667|CCO|HAS-- RHYTHM, COMPLEX RHYME
20101211024752.667|20101211024754.333|CCO|SCHEMES, ALLUSIVE AND METAPHORIC
20101211024754.333|20101211024756.000|CCO|LANGUAGE.
20101211024756.000|20101211024757.667|CCO|AS RAPPER LAURYN HILL PUT IT
20101211024757.667|20101211024759.333|CCO|ONCE IN A SONG:
20101211024759.333|20101211024801.000|CCO|"I TREAT THIS LIKE MY THESIS
20101211024801.000|20101211024802.667|CCO|WELL-WRITTEN TOPIC BROKEN DOWN
20101211024802.667|20101211024804.333|CCO|INTO PIECES
20101211024804.333|20101211024806.000|CCO|I INTRODUCE, THEN PRODUCE WORDS
20101211024806.000|20101211024807.667|CCO|SO PROFUSE."
20101211024807.667|20101211024809.333|CCO|>> WHAT WE WANTED TO DO WITH THE
20101211024809.333|20101211024811.000|CCO|ANTHOLOGY IS TO SAY THAT THIS IS
20101211024811.000|20101211024813.000|CCO|A TRADITION IN FULL.
20101211024813.000|20101211024815.000|CCO|YES, IT'S RELATED IN PROFOUND
20101211024815.000|20101211024817.000|CCO|WAYS TO THE BROADER TRADITION OF
20101211024817.000|20101211024819.000|CCO|WESTERN LYRIC POETRY.
20101211024819.000|20101211024821.000|CCO|YES, IT'S RELATED IN PROFOUND
20101211024821.000|20101211024823.500|CCO|WAYS TO THE AMERICAN SONGBOOK
20101211024823.500|20101211024826.000|CCO|ACROSS ALL GENRES OF MUSC.
20101211024826.000|20101211024828.500|CCO|AND YES, IT'S RELATED IN
20101211024828.500|20101211024831.000|CCO|IMPORTANT WAYS, AS WELL, TO THE
20101211024831.000|20101211024832.429|CCO|AFRICAN-AMERICAN ORAL TRADITION
20101211024832.429|20101211024833.857|CCO|OF THE TOASTS AND SIGNIFYING,
20101211024833.857|20101211024835.286|CCO|THE DOZENS.
20101211024835.286|20101211024836.714|CCO|IT'S ALL THERE.
20101211024836.714|20101211024838.143|CCO|BUT FINALLY, IT'S A TRADITION
20101211024838.143|20101211024839.571|CCO|THAT CAN STAND ON ITS OWN.
20101211024839.571|20101211024841.000|CCO|>> Brown: THE PIONEERS OF RAP
20101211024841.000|20101211024843.500|CCO|DREW INSPIRATION FROM RHYTHM AND
20101211024843.500|20101211024846.000|CCO|BLUES, AND SOUL MUSIC.
20101211024846.000|20101211024848.500|CCO|
20101211024848.500|20101211024851.000|CCO|
20101211024851.000|20101211024852.667|CCO|>> Brown: BUT RAPPERS LIKE
20101211024852.667|20101211024854.333|CCO|KURTIS BLOW SEIZED UPON A
20101211024854.333|20101211024856.000|CCO|DISTINCT BEAT AND USE OF
20101211024856.000|20101211024857.667|CCO|LANGUAGE.
20101211024857.667|20101211024859.333|CCO|DECADES LATER, HE PARTICIPATED
20101211024859.333|20101211024901.000|CCO|IN THE WASHINGTON EVENT
20101211024901.000|20101211024902.250|CCO|CELEBRATING RAP, AND TOLD US
20101211024902.250|20101211024903.500|CCO|HE'D KNOWN EARLY ON THAT HE AND
20101211024903.500|20101211024904.750|CCO|OTHERS WERE ON TO SOMETHING.
20101211024904.750|20101211024906.000|CCO|>> I JUST KNEW IT WAS GOING TO
20101211024906.000|20101211024907.250|CCO|SPREAD AND IT WAS GOING TO BE
20101211024907.250|20101211024908.500|CCO|BIG.
20101211024908.500|20101211024909.750|CCO|>> Brown: DID YOU THINK OF
20101211024909.750|20101211024911.000|CCO|YOURSELF AS A POET?
20101211024911.000|20101211024913.500|CCO|>> OF COURSE.
20101211024913.500|20101211024916.000|CCO|>> Brown: YOU DID.
20101211024916.000|20101211024918.500|CCO|>> YES, DEFINITELY.
20101211024918.500|20101211024921.000|CCO|WE WRITE OUR RAPS WITH METERS,
20101211024921.000|20101211024923.000|CCO|AND IN POETRY, YOU HAVE TO HAVE
20101211024923.000|20101211024925.000|CCO|A METER-- YOU KNOW, YOU'RE A...
20101211024925.000|20101211024927.000|CCO|YOU'RE A-A, A-B, B-B.
20101211024927.000|20101211024929.000|CCO|AND THEN YOU REPEAT THESE METERS
20101211024929.000|20101211024931.000|CCO|WHEN YOU CONTINUE YOUR RAP AS
20101211024931.000|20101211024932.667|CCO|YOU ARE WRITING.
20101211024932.667|20101211024934.333|CCO|SO THE RHYTHM, OR WE CL IT
20101211024934.333|20101211024936.000|CCO|"THE FLOW," IS VERY, VERY
20101211024936.000|20101211024937.667|CCO|IMPORTANT.
20101211024937.667|20101211024939.333|CCO|BUT IT IS JUST LIKE POETRY.
20101211024939.333|20101211024941.000|CCO|>>  I'M EXPRESSING WITH MY FULL
20101211024941.000|20101211024943.000|CCO|CAPABILITIES...
20101211024943.000|20101211024945.000|CCO|>> Brown: RAP AND THE LARGER
20101211024945.000|20101211024947.000|CCO|HIP-HOP CULTURE EXPLODED IN THE
20101211024947.000|20101211024949.000|CCO|LATE '80s AND EARLY '90s, WITH
20101211024949.000|20101211024951.000|CCO|RECORDS SELLING IN THE MILLIONS.
20101211024951.000|20101211024952.667|CCO|PERHAPS NOT INCIDENTALLY, THE
20101211024952.667|20101211024954.333|CCO|ERA ALSO SAW THE RISE OF SO-
20101211024954.333|20101211024956.000|CCO|CALLED "GANGSTA RAP," WHICH
20101211024956.000|20101211024957.667|CCO|EXTOLLED THE LIFE OF GANGS AND
20101211024957.667|20101211024959.333|CCO|GUNS, AND PROVOKED THE HUGE RAP
20101211024959.333|20101211025001.000|CCO|ON RAP-- THE CONDEMNATION FOR
20101211025001.000|20101211025004.333|CCO|ITS PERCEIVED MISOGYNY AND
20101211025004.333|20101211025007.667|CCO|GLORIFICATION OF VIOLENCE.
20101211025007.667|20101211025011.000|CCO|
20101211025011.000|20101211025012.667|CCO|THE NEW ANTHOLOGY DOESN'T SHY
20101211025012.667|20101211025014.333|CCO|AWAY FROM THIS, BUT IT DOES SHOW
20101211025014.333|20101211025016.000|CCO|THAT RAPPERS ALWAYS WROTE ABOUT
20101211025016.000|20101211025017.667|CCO|, AND EVEN RAISED QUESTIONS
20101211025017.667|20101211025019.333|CCO|MANY ASPECTS OF LIFE.
20101211025019.333|20101211025021.000|CCO|>>  WHAT'S GOING ON IN YOUR
20101211025021.000|20101211025022.667|CCO|MIND IS WHAT I ASK YA...
20101211025022.667|20101211025024.333|CCO|>> THE IMPORTANT THING IS THAT,
20101211025024.333|20101211025026.000|CCO|WHEN IT IS THERE, IT MAKES NO
20101211025026.000|20101211025027.667|CCO|SENSE NOT TO TAKE IT SERIOUSLY
20101211025027.667|20101211025029.333|CCO|AND LOOK AT IT WITHOUT HAVING A
20101211025029.333|20101211025031.000|CCO|KNEE-JERK REACTION.
20101211025031.000|20101211025034.333|CCO|WE COULD THINK OF SO MANY POETS
20101211025034.333|20101211025037.667|CCO|AND DRAMATISTS AND NOVELISTS
20101211025037.667|20101211025041.000|CCO|WHOSE MATERIALS, BY SOMEONE,
20101211025041.000|20101211025043.000|CCO|ANYONE, MIGHT BE CONSIDERED
20101211025043.000|20101211025045.000|CCO|UTTERLY OFFENSIVE.
20101211025045.000|20101211025047.000|CCO|>> Brown: ONE RAPPER KNOWN FOR
20101211025047.000|20101211025049.000|CCO|WRITING ABOUT SOCIAL PROBLEMS
20101211025049.000|20101211025051.000|CCO|AND MUCH MORE IS CHICAGO-BORN
20101211025051.000|20101211025054.333|CCO|COMMON, WHO HAD A STRING OF HITS
20101211025054.333|20101211025057.667|CCO|BEGINNING IN THE MID-'90s.
20101211025057.667|20101211025101.000|CCO|
20101211025101.000|20101211025103.000|CCO|>> Brown: AND IS STILL GOING
20101211025103.000|20101211025105.000|CCO|STRONG, EVEN AS HE'S BRANCHED
20101211025105.000|20101211025107.000|CCO|OUT TO ACT IN FILMS.
20101211025107.000|20101211025109.000|CCO|AT THE RECENT WASHINGTON EVENT,
20101211025109.000|20101211025111.000|CCO|COMMON PERFORMED THE FIRST RAP
20101211025111.000|20101211025112.667|CCO|HE EVER WROTE, AT AGE 12.
20101211025112.667|20101211025114.333|CCO|>> I WAS GOING TO RUN A COLD
20101211025114.333|20101211025116.000|CCO|SHOW, WHEN I WAS THERE I SAW
20101211025116.000|20101211025117.667|CCO|PEOPLE JAMMINGING TOO.
20101211025117.667|20101211025119.333|CCO|THEY CALLED THEMSELVES THE
20101211025119.333|20101211025121.000|CCO|BLOND HILL CREW.
20101211025121.000|20101211025123.000|CCO|DR. ICE, ROMEO, AND MASTER E,
20101211025123.000|20101211025125.000|CCO|ALL OF THE BLIND HILL CREW
20101211025125.000|20101211025127.000|CCO|RAPPED INTO A TEAM.
20101211025127.000|20101211025129.000|CCO|IT WAS JUST ME SAYING "THIS IS
20101211025129.000|20101211025131.000|CCO|WHAT I'M ABOUT.
20101211025131.000|20101211025133.000|CCO|I'M A COOL LITTLE 12-YEAR-OLD."
20101211025133.000|20101211025135.000|CCO|AND IT WAS MY WAY OF... AT THAT
20101211025135.000|20101211025137.000|CCO|TIME IN MY LIFE, I DON'T KNOW IF
20101211025137.000|20101211025139.000|CCO|I WAS ALWAYS AS EXPRESSIVE AS I
20101211025139.000|20101211025141.000|CCO|WAS THROUGH RAP.
20101211025141.000|20101211025142.667|CCO|YOU KNOW, HOW YOU PICK
20101211025142.667|20101211025144.333|CCO|SOMETHING, A PERSON CAN HAVE A
20101211025144.333|20101211025146.000|CCO|SHY PERSONALITY, BUT YOU PICK UP
20101211025146.000|20101211025147.667|CCO|SOMETHING THAT YOU FEEL
20101211025147.667|20101211025149.333|CCO|COMFORTABLE AND CONFIDENT IN?
20101211025149.333|20101211025151.000|CCO|THAT IS WHAT HIP HOP WAS TO ME.
20101211025151.000|20101211025152.429|CCO|>> Brown: WERE YOU A SHY
20101211025152.429|20101211025153.857|CCO|>> Brown: IN THE AFTERWARD TO
20101211025153.857|20101211025155.286|CCO|THIS BOOK, IN AN ESSAY, YOU
20101211025155.286|20101211025156.714|CCO|WROTE THAT THE ANTHOLOGY LETS US
20101211025156.714|20101211025158.143|CCO|SEE BEYOND THE STEREOTYPE.
20101211025158.143|20101211025159.571|CCO|WHAT DO YOU MEAN?
20101211025159.571|20101211025201.000|CCO|WHAT DO YOU SEE WHEN YOU LOOK AT
20101211025201.000|20101211025202.667|CCO|ALL THIS?
